overview:
Sure, technology is amazing but who would’ve thought you could use it to send real postcards digitally with just the tap of a button and have them actually delivered in the mail? Yep, that’s right! With our Android, iPhone and Windows postcard app, you can take a picture on your phone and send a REAL postcard through the mail. Connect with the people you love and share your memories by sending post cards right from your phone.

http://www.postcardontherun.com/
